title: Protocol an Imaging Study
description: A radiologist needs to review an order for a 'CT Abdomen' and select the specific technical protocol for the CT technologist to use (e.g., with or without contrast).

tasks.description: Open the list of exams waiting to be protocoled.
tasks.expected_outcome: Radiologist views their worklist of pending exams.

tasks.description: Review the patient's clinical history and the reason for the exam.
tasks.expected_outcome: Radiologist gathers clinical context to make the best decision.

tasks.description: Select the appropriate protocol ('CT Abdomen/Pelvis with IV Contrast') and approve it.
tasks.expected_outcome: The exam is now ready for the technologist to perform, with clear instructions on the specific imaging technique to use.
